lines: 1. Monene ninkoigwete,Nganyet' eng'ana yao,Nyigwet' okwane ondemie;'Monene kwana bono;Ningotegererete,As'ari'onsi orantebie.
2. Monen' onyator'erieta,Eri' omonye nase nde,Kwana nainche ntunye bwango,Ndemete nsibogete;'S'Omorisi'ararae,'Kiriri Ki'egetare.
3. Nonya nd'omoke, ochayire,Tonseri 'otanyigweti,Monene nomanyet' onsi,Ayar'enkoro yane;Nomanyet' okogania,Kwana eri'onsesenie.
4. Monene Kwan'ombek'ang'e,Riogi riao riigweke,'S'okoigwera n'omogoko,Nimbwati' eng'ana yao;Monene ninkoigwete,Koranche kwana nainche.
